value:
$WmMPID_愛の祭ヘクトル,ch03_05_Hector_M_Valentine18,Face|The time has come to settle things.
This is the last battle of the
tournament, so I won't hold back.$k$pBefore that, though... Eliwood, we
need to talk.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭エリウッド,ch03_06_Eliwod_M_Valentine18,Face|What's on your mind?$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ヘクトル,ch03_05_Hector_M_Valentine18,Face|I saw my daughter coming out of one
of the shops over there with a present
in her hand and a smile on her face.$k$pLet me ask you straight: who do you
think it's for?$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭エリウッド,ch03_06_Eliwod_M_Valentine18,Face|I couldn't say. Why don't you ask
Lilina yourself?$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ヘクトル,ch03_05_Hector_M_Valentine18,Face|She's been palling around with that
son of yours all day, Eliwood. You
don't think it's for him, do you?$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭エリウッド,ch03_06_Eliwod_M_Valentine18,Face|There's no proof of that, Hector. Why
are you getting so worked up? It could
be for someone else—$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ヘクトル,ch03_05_Hector_M_Valentine18,Face|Not a chance! She's going to give it
to your boy!$k$pLet me make myself clear.$k$pWe may be close, but there's no way
I'm letting my little girl get married into
any family—even yours!$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭リン,ch03_00_Lin_F_Valentine18,Face|Enough foolishness, you two. It's time
to fight!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|We did it! We won!$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ヘクトル,ch03_05_Hector_M_Valentine18,Face|Damn it all. They got us. Is my
strength failing me?$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭リリーナ,ch02_03_Lilina_F_Valentine18,Face|Father, you aren't hurt, are you?$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ヘクトル,ch03_05_Hector_M_Valentine18,Face|No, I'm fine. I'm just sorry I couldn't
show my little girl my very best.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭リリーナ,ch02_03_Lilina_F_Valentine18,Face|That's not true, Father. Your strength
shines on the battlefield.$k$pOh, and...before I forget...here. I got
you a present, Father.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ヘクトル,ch03_05_Hector_M_Valentine18,Face|Me? You got this for me?$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭エリウッド,ch03_06_Eliwod_M_Valentine18,Face|How thoughtful. Right, Hector?$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ヘクトル,ch03_05_Hector_M_Valentine18,Face|Uh... Uh, yes. Thank you.$k$pAre...are you sure you want to give
this to me?$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭リリーナ,ch02_03_Lilina_F_Valentine18,Face|Yes. What I wanted most from today
was to give you a gift. After all...$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ヘクトル,ch03_05_Hector_M_Valentine18,Face|So that's it. I see...$k$pWhere you come from, I'm already
dead.$k$pI'm sorry. The last thing I'd ever want
to do is make my little girl cry. I don't
want you to have to miss me...$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭リリーナ,ch02_03_Lilina_F_Valentine18,Face|No, it's... I mean, that's not...$k$pI'm just so happy that we're here
enjoying this festival together.$k$pIt's a dream come true for me. Truly.
Thank you, Father, for everything...$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ヘクトル,ch03_05_Hector_M_Valentine18,Face|Lilina...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|The Day of Devotion is about more
than candy! A festival where you get
to tell your loved ones how you feel...$k$pIt's beautiful, isn't it?$k$pAnd now it's time for MY presents.$k$pFirst, $Nu...$k$pI packed this present with a lot of
love! Oh, it's so embarrassing to say
this, but hear me out...$k$pThank you for everything you do. You
mean a lot to me. I hope we'll always
stick together!$k$p$Sbs150|
